patthana14.30:1.1_0: Savitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:2.1_0: Avitakkaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavitakko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.30:3.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
patthana14.30:4.1_0: Savicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana14.30:5.1_0: Avicāraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naavicāro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.)
patthana14.30:6.1_0: Hetuyā nava …pe… purejāte āsevane cha …pe… avigate nava.
